This has such a good premise!!! The mangaka just needs to elaborate it a bit more! For now I’ll say expand on the original 4 pages by a lot and maybe end it with the mother finding the son’s school report about her deepest darkest secret! 😤

Also this is a bit of a stretch now but seeing how her son never really went into detail on what EXACTLY she was DOING alone with her dog (IRL any grownup will understand the hidden context within the innocent child’s report, especially with that “wrestling” on the bed part, but this a doujin so that goes out the window for now) since she’s a broken woman who lust over a dogs penis now, might as well destroy her son’s innocence as well and include him in her taboo activities somehow. Or have an antagonist show up (teacher, father, witness) and understand the boys report and begin blackmailing the mother?
